refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Keyword used in statement select ... case ... end
Use it in the following way:
refsection.programlisting: select expr0 case expr1 then instructions 1 case expr2 then instructions 2 ... case exprn then instructions n [else instructions] end

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: OS=getos() select OS case "Windows" then disp("Scilab on Windows") case "Linux" then disp("Scilab on Linux") case "Darwin" then disp("Scilab on Mac OS") else error("Scilab on unknown platform") end
